longInfo:
Passport required.
- Nationals of Hungary are allowed to enter with expired (max.
  1 year) normal passports and national ID cards.
- Temporary passports issued to nationals of Hungary must be
  valid on arrival.
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card: 
 - issued to nationals of Hungary; 
- Holders of temporary passports issued to nationals of
  Hungary. 

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Hungary will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- All minors who are nationals of Hungary are expected to hold
  their own travel document.
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination.
Warning:
- Passports must be signed by the holder
